nodes.bodyText: Isn't there a reasonable replacement for getHostAddress()? If you don't want to fix it now, better leave the annotation away.
are you sure that I could remove the instance check (command may be of different types)
Actually you can do if(command == UpDownType.UP || command == OnOffType.ON). The == operator will return false if the type is different.
